resources.string: Contacts will be periodically uploaded to the Amazon cloud to make it easier to find friends and family, and make calls.
Call your phone contacts hands free with [Acme Brandon] and Amazon Alexa. Your contacts on %1$s will be uploaded to the Amazon service.
Enable requests like \“Alexa, call Sam\” for contacts on this phone. Contacts will be uploaded to the Amazon service.
Upload contacts to the Amazon service to call \& message them by name
Hear messages from this phone when you ask \“Alexa, check my text messages\”. SMS messages will be uploaded to the Amazon service.
Upload SMS messages to the Amazon service to have them read to you
You can use Alexa to call or text contacts from a connected phone.
You can use Alexa to call from a connected phone.
To connect to a different phone, visit:
Any other contacts saved to your Alexa account are also available. To manage this, go to the Communicate tab in the Alexa mobile app.
Allow access to your contacts and SMS messages?
Contacts and SMS messages will be periodically uploaded to the Amazon cloud to make it easier to find friends and family, make calls, and send and receive messages.
